#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
bool sieve[5000005];
ll MOD=1000000007,id[200005];
vector<int> prime;
long long int power(long long int a, long long int b)
{
    long long int x=1,y=a;
    while(b > 0)
    {
        if(b%2 == 1)
        {
            x=(x*y);
            if(x>MOD) x%=MOD;
        }
        y = (y*y);
        if(y>MOD) y%=MOD;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x;
}
int main()
{
    int i,j,t,k;
    for(i=2;i*i<=3000000;i++)
        if(!sieve[i])
        for(j=i*i;j<=3000000;j+=i)
            sieve[j]=true;
    for(i=2;i<=3000000;i++)
        if(!sieve[i])
        prime.push_back(i);
    for(i=1;i<=200000;i++)
        id[i]=power(prime[i-1],prime[i-1]);
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>k;
        cout<<id[k]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
